attributes.action: Change speed requirements of car seat crash tests to 60mph on all car seats.
attributes.additional_details: A lot of companies sell cheap car seats which are cheaply made and not safe. If the restrictions were changed this would put a stop to unsafe car seats been sold and potentially save a life
attributes.background: To help save Young lives of by making the minimum crash test 60mph to prevent companies selling unsafe car seats.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333568
